short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension effortlessly converts swim times between long course and both American and European short courses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows swimmers and coaches to quickly convert their swim times from one pool length to another. It uses the officially accepted age group conversion factors and produces accurate conversions.

LCM = Long Course Meters (50 meter pool)
SCM = Short Course Meters (25 meter pool)
SCY = Short Course Yards (25 yard pool)

**Distance SCM and LCM is assumed to be 400, 800, 1500 meters
**Distance SCY is assumed to be 500, 1000, 1650 yards
